overview.en: Pixie Shopping Street is the world’s first UGC creativity and virtual goods trading platform based on block-chain technology. Pixie Shopping Street is customized for ACG designers and fans. PixieCoin is the only token used on this platform.
overview.zh: 妖精购物街是全球首家基于区块链技术的UGC创意和虚拟物品交易平台。妖精购物街为二次元设计师和爱好者量身打造，PXC是在应用在上面的唯一的通证。
